snippet: Keeping a toddler away from someone else’s TV; regretting some teenage nastiness, decades later; when a friend doesn’t want your help.
abstract: Philip Galanes Social Q's on keeping toddlers away from someone else's TV, regretting some teenage nastiness decades later, helping friend learn how to date and damaging furniture while catsitting.
lead_paragraph: Keeping a toddler away from someone else’s TV; regretting some teenage nastiness, decades later; when a friend doesn’t want your help.
